Can't Hardly Wait

It’s awesome, a really quick read, and quite thought-provoking. It’s the kind of book you want to keep around for the bibliography alone. I’ve been on a roll, reading-wise recently, just yesterday finishing Alan Watt’s The Book - On the Taboo Against Knowing Who You Are, which was pretty interesting, though I’ve not yet digested it. I’ll render a verdict later, when I’ve had more time to consider it. (I just checked out his page on wikipedia, which is pretty interesting. Also has a fantastic photograph of him; I don’t know why I like it so much, but I love that photo.)

That’s it for now, and goodnight.

-Spencer
